description.plain:
Major Lazer is an electronic dancehall project created by producers Diplo and Switch in 2009. The current members of the group are Diplo, Walshy Fire, and Ape Drums. Former members include Switch, Skerrit Bwoy, and Jillionaire.

Major Lazer has released four full-length albums: Guns Don’t Kill People… Lazers Do in 2009, Free the Universe in 2013, Peace is the Mission in 2015 and Music is the Weapon, in 2020.

body.plain:
Major Lazer is an electronic dancehall project created by producers Diplo and Switch in 2009. The current members of the group are Diplo, Walshy Fire, and Ape Drums. Former members include Switch, Skerrit Bwoy, and Jillionaire.

Major Lazer has released four full-length albums: Guns Don’t Kill People… Lazers Do in 2009, Free the Universe in 2013, Peace is the Mission in 2015 and Music is the Weapon, in 2020.

songs.full_title: Cold Water by Major Lazer (Ft. Justin Bieber & MØ)
songs.title: Cold Water

description.plain:
“Cold Water” is about coming together to face adversity and to say that you have your partner’s back no matter what the situation is.

Diplo and Justin Bieber hinted about the song through some cryptic tweets. Diplo then announced to Fact Mag that “Cold Water” would be premiered on his Beats 1 radio show Lazer Sound “sometime Summer 2016.”

In early July, Justin announced their collaboration on the project with a tweet:

https://twitter.com/justinbieber/status/748875758873878530?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw

On July 20th, in his final teaser for the track, Justin began releasing pieces of the lyrics to “Cold Water” in the form of direct messages to his fans on Twitter who used the #ColdWater2Days hashtag.

songs.embed_content: Read “Cold Water” by Major Lazer on Genius

songs.lyrics:
113 ContributorsCold Water Lyrics[Verse 1: Justin Bieber]
Everybody gets high sometimes, you know
What else can we do when we're feelin' low?
So take a deep breath and let it go
You shouldn't be drowning on your own

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber]
And if you feel you're sinking, I will jump right over
Into cold, cold water for you
And although time may take us into different places
I will still be patient with you
And I hope you know...
[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
I won't let go
I'll be your lifeline tonight
I won't let go
I'll be your lifeline tonight

[Verse 2: Justin Bieber]
'Cause we all get lost sometimes, you know?
It's how we learn and how we grow
And I wanna lay with you 'til I'm old, o-old
You shouldn't be fighting on your own

[Pre-Chorus: Justin Bieber]
And if you feel you're sinking, I will jump right over
Into cold, cold water for you
And although time may take us into different places
I will still be patient with you
And I hope you know...

[Chorus: Justin Bieber]
I won't let go
And I won't let go, no-no, no-no, no I won't
I'll be your lifeline tonight
I won't let go
I'll be your lifeline tonight
You might also like[Bridge: MØ]
Come on, come on
Save me from my rocking boat
I just wanna stay afloat
I'm all alone
And I hope, I hope someone's gonna take me home
Somewhere I can rest my soul (rest my soul)
I need to know you won't let go

[Chorus: Justin Bieber & MØ]
And I won't let go, no-no, no-no, no, I won't
I'll be your lifeline tonight
You won't let go
I'll be your lifeline tonight

[Outro: Justin Bieber]
I won't let go, no no, no no, no, I won't
I'll be your lifeline tonight
You won't let go
I'll be your lifeline tonight89Embed

songs.full_title: Lean On by Major Lazer (Ft. DJ Snake & MØ)
songs.title: Lean On

description.plain:
“Lean On” is the lead single from and fourth song on Major Lazer’s third studio album. Peace Is the Mission. The track features MØ on vocals, and DJ Snake on co-production.

It’s an Indian-influenced reggae house song about the exhilaration and disappointment of young love.

When making the video, Diplo had this to say:

India is special and its beauty absolutely humbled me. When we toured there as Major Lazer, it was mind blowing to see our fan-base and we wanted to incorporate the attitude and positive vibes into our video and just do something that embodies the essence of Major Lazer. Major Lazer has always been a culture mashup and to us, India feels like some kind of special creature with one foot in history and one firmly in the future. The experience is something we’ll never forget.”

As of October 2018, it is the sixteenth most viewed video on YouTube with 2.39 billion views.

songs.lyrics:
100 ContributorsTranslationsPortuguêsFrançaisΕλληνικάLean On Lyrics[Produced by Major Lazer and DJ Snake]
[Verse 1]
Do you recall, not long ago
We would walk on the sidewalk?
Innocent, remember?
All we did was care for each other
But the night was warm
We were bold and young
All around, the wind blows
We would only hold on to let go
[Chorus]
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
We need someone to lean on
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
All we need is somebody to lean on
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
We need someone to lean on
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
A-A-All we need is somebody to lean on

[Drop]
(Hey, hey, hey, hey)
(Hey, hey, hey, hey)

[Verse 2]
What will we do when we get old?
Will we walk down the same road?
Will you be there by my side?
Standin' strong as the waves roll over
When the nights are long
Longing for you to come home
All around, the wind blows
We would only hold on to let go
[Chorus]
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
We need someone to lean on
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
All we need is somebody to lean on (Hey)
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
We need someone to lean on
Blow a kiss, fire a gun
A-A-All we need is somebody to lean on
You might also like[Drop]
All we need is somebody to lean on
(We need someone to lean on, hey)
(Hey, hey)
A-A-All we need is somebody to lean on
(Major Lazer, hey)

[Bridge]
Oh, oh-oh
(Hey, hey, hey, hey)
(Hey, hey, hey, hey, hey)
[Chorus]
Blow a kiss, fire a gun (Hey, hey)
We need someone to lean on (Hey, hey)
Blow a kiss, fire a gun (Hey, hey)
All we need is somebody to lean on (Hey, hey)
Blow a kiss, fire a gun (Hey, hey)
We need someone to lean on (Hey, hey)
Blow a kiss, fire a gun (Hey, hey)
A-A-All we need is somebody to lean on (Hey, hey)344Embed

songs.artist_names: Major Lazer (Ft. 2 Chainz, Bruno Mars, Mystic & Tyga)
songs.full_title: Bubble Butt by Major Lazer (Ft. 2 Chainz, Bruno Mars, Mystic & Tyga)
songs.title: Bubble Butt
songs.title_with_featured: Bubble Butt (Ft. 2 Chainz, Bruno Mars, Mystic & Tyga)

description.plain:
Bubble Butt is a single off Major Lazer’s Sophomore album “Free The Universe”. It features many artists like Tyga, Bruno Mars, Mystic Davis, and would later feature 2 Chainz.

https://twitter.com/MAJORLAZER/status/338059549699371008

Bubble Butt peaked at number 56 in the US Billboard Hot 100 on August 24, 2013. It became Major Lazer’s most successful single until a year and 5 days later when Lean On peaked at number 4 on the Top 100 charts.

body.plain:
Bubble Butt is a single off Major Lazer’s Sophomore album “Free The Universe”. It features many artists like Tyga, Bruno Mars, Mystic Davis, and would later feature 2 Chainz.

https://twitter.com/MAJORLAZER/status/338059549699371008

Bubble Butt peaked at number 56 in the US Billboard Hot 100 on August 24, 2013. It became Major Lazer’s most successful single until a year and 5 days later when Lean On peaked at number 4 on the Top 100 charts.
